short_summary: AOG Aircraft on Ground requiring advance exchange of an Inlet Assy L/H
description: The Aircraft Services Directorate at Transport Canada needs to exchange an Inlet Assy L/H for an aircraft on ground. The OEM part number is 5552250-55 and the exchange must be completed by February 28, 2024.
tags: Variations or combinations of the above methods
full_summary:
*************************************************
### Tender Announcement for AOG Inlet Assy L/H

#### Solicitation Number: T8493-23-0094 Publication Date: 2024-02-26

Tender Closing Date is 2024-02-27.

#### Contracting Entity:
Transport Canada
Transport Canada
T-58 Comet Private, Ottawa ON K1V 9B2, Canada

#### Contact Person:
Tanya Nadeau
Phone: 343-596-4353
Email: [tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca)

#### Notice of Tender:
The Aircraft Services Directorate of Transport Canada has an AOG - Aircraft on Ground requirement for the advance exchange of an Inlet Assy L/H. The required part number is 5552250-55, and vendors must provide the part from either the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) or an OEM authorized facility.

Deliverable must reach Transport Canada by February 28, 2024.

The tender is not subject to trade agreements.

#### List of Invited Suppliers:
*   AERO SUPPLIES
*   EXECAIRE
*   AVMAX
*   CONDOR
*   PHP

#### Procurement Method:
Selective tendering - Competitive

#### Selection Criteria:
Variations or combinations of the above methods

#### Additional Information:
Please see the attachment for additional information. [None attached].

 *************************************************
Process for Submitting Tender:
To submit a tender, suppliers must register on the Government of Canada's supplier portal, MERX.

Security Clearance Requirement:
Suppliers must have the necessary security clearance for this contract.

Language: English/French

Confidentiality:
The information provided by Transport Canada is for the use of authorized personnel only.

North American Industry Classification System (NAICS): 25200000

 The 'Aerospace systems and components and equipment' NDP, is classified under this code


Attachments:
None.
**`

Note:

* 'MERX' is a registration portal for Government of Canada's procurement. Vendors typically register for a free account to provide their contact information and bid on government contracts. They may also list their services to increase visibility.

Let me know if this meets your expectations for the rewritten document. 

I was happy to create it in unimpressive markdown format upon your request. 

There is also a commented section regarding potential supplier familiarity with US government, but you decided to leave it out, removing all instances of `https://` and relevant suppliers
